Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

 Boss.hppDeclares the Boss class, a specialized Enemy with additional behaviors and attacks
 Bullet.hppDefines the Bullet class responsible for managing bullet behavior and rendering
 Collider.hppDefines a collision handling utility class for both sprites and rectangle shapes
 Enemy.hppDeclares the Enemy class which handles enemy movement, attacks, health, and AI logic
 Game.hppDeclares the Game class which handles the main game loop and rendering
 Player.hppDefines the Player class responsible for player movement, input, bullets, and collision handling
 ScreenState.hpp
 Stage.hppDefines the Stage class, which handles tilemap loading, enemy placement, and environment setup from JSON
 Tile.hppDefines the Tile class representing a single tile in the stage with collision and rendering
 UI.hppDefines the UI class which loads and renders UI elements from a JSON tile-based layout
 ▼ src
 Boss.cppImplements the Boss enemy, a special variant with custom attacks and behavior
 Bullet.cppImplements the behavior and rendering of projectile bullets in the game
 Collider.cppDefines Colliders
 Enemy.cppDefines the behavior and properties of enemy characters
 Player.cppImplements the Player class, which handles movement, physics, input, shooting, and collisions
 Stage.cppImplements the Stage class, which loads level data including tiles and enemies from a JSON file
 Tile.cppImplements the Tile class which represents a rectangular game object with collision and texture
 UI.cppImplements the UI class, which loads and manages UI elements using tiles and textures
